name: Space-Fix-Attack
description:
Space-Fix-Attack is a space shooter where you have to use an unstable ship. Fight aliens, avoid obstacles and keep your ship stable to survive.

Controls:

Move your mouse to move

Right click to shoot

Left click to open fix UI

Bug fixes 1:

Particles not pausing - Fixed.

UI collider trigger interfering on each other - Fixed.

Bug fixes 2:

Cursor not showing after player died - fixed.

Bug fixes 3:

How to play button not showing tutorial - Fixed.

Enemies move too fast - Fixed.

Bug fixes 4:

Cursor not showing after you win - Fixed.

Sound effect and enemies death effect not playing mid game - Fixed.

Less enemies at mid game - Fixed.

Bug fixes 5:

Gun fixing UI have the wrong color - Fixed.

Player not taking damage while fixing - Fixed.

Fixing UI does not change properly - Fixed.
